edu.concordia.app.components

Class FavorTokens

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.concordia.app.components.FavorTokens

  • public class FavorTokens
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates Favor Tokens for the players to use in the game Favor Tokens are used by the player to exchange lantern cards
    Author:
    Team E
